Uses of Interface
org.barghos.core.color.api.IHDRColor3W

  • Packages that use IHDRColor3W 
    Package Description
    org.barghos.core.color
    This package contains all basic implementations of LDR/HDR RGB/RGBA colors.
    org.barghos.core.color.api  

    • Uses of IHDRColor3W in org.barghos.core.color

      Classes in org.barghos.core.color that implement IHDRColor3W 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HDRColor3
      This class is a simple implementation of an HDRColor3.

      Methods in org.barghos.core.color.api that return IHDRColor3W 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IHDRColor3W IHDRColor3W.set(double scalar)
      Sets the rgb components to scalar.

      Sets the rgb components to r, g and b.

      Sets the rgb components to scalar.
      IHDRColor3W IHDRColor3W.set(int r, int g, int b)
      Sets the rgb components to r, g and b.
      IHDRColor3W IHDRColor3W.set(ITup3R t)
      Sets the rgb components to the values of t.
      IHDRColor3W IHDRColor3W.setB(int b)
      Set the blue component to b.
      IHDRColor3W IHDRColor3W.setG(int g)
      Set the green component to g.
      IHDRColor3W IHDRColor3W.setR(int r)
      Set the red component to r.
      IHDRColor3W IHDRColor3W.setUnityB(double b)
      Set the blue component to b.
      IHDRColor3W IHDRColor3W.setUnityG(double g)
      Set the green component to g.
      IHDRColor3W IHDRColor3W.setUnityR(double r)
      Set the red component to r.
      default IHDRColor3W IHDRColor3W.setX(double x)
      Set the red component to x.
      default IHDRColor3W IHDRColor3W.setY(double y)
      Set the green component to y.
      default IHDRColor3W IHDRColor3W.setZ(double z)
      Set the blue component to z.
